name: Portia Ltd
legal: Not For Profit Company limited by guarantee
goal: Portia Ltd designs and implements effective, evidence-based strategies and projects for advancing quality of research and innovation by addressing common gender problems in institutional practices, in science knowledge making, in human capital development, and in implementation of STI policy. Our work covers gender equality issues in STEM and gender dimension in research and innovation content, process, and impact across wide variety of science (STEM) fields and endeavours.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Portia was consortium partner in the GENERA project, funded under Horizon 2020, which on completion has become the GENERA Network
Portia is consortium partner in H2020 ACT project
Portia is consortium partner in DG RTD project on statistical gender indicators in STEM, She Figures 2018
Portia convenes the Gender Summit - Europe, which is an outcome from the FP7 project genSET (2009 - 2011). Two events were hosted by the European Parliament
